title: @Riot. Honest Question.
body:
**Why don't you promote and place Teambuilder as the prime queue for playing League of Legends?**

Have it as a part of tutorial or those pop up tips saying that Teambuilder allows you more freedom. 
Replace the order of game modes when creating a lobby so that Teambuilder is at the top, not Blind Pick. 
Move the free IP bonus to Teambuilder only to bring more people into it. 

I feel as though there is not enough emphasis on Trambuilder in the client UI. Seeing as how Teambuilder is superior to Blind Pick.

TL;DR: Discorage Blind Pick use and promote Teambuilder.

replies.body: Some of us don't want to wait 300 years in queue but aye teambuilder needs to be promoted.
